c74object.name: jit.ndi.receive~
c74object.digest: Receive video/audio from a network source using the NDI protocol
c74object.description:
NDI® is a protocol developed by NewTek for streaming video/audio over IP. It allows multiple video systems to identify and communicate with one another over IP, and to encode, transmit and receive many streams of high quality, low latency, frame-accurate video and audio in real-time. NDI can operate bi-directionally over a local area network, with many video streams on a shared connection. It's encoding algorithm is resolution and frame-rate independent, supporting 4K and beyond, along with 16 channels and more of floating-point audio. The protocol includes tools that implement video access rights, grouping, bi-directional metadata, IP commands, tally status and PTZ camera control.
NDI® is a registered trademark of NewTek, Inc.

objarg.name: hostname
objarg.description: Sets the host name of the NDI sender to receive from. If not specified then the host will be set to the local machine.

objarg.name: name
objarg.description: Sets the unique name of the NDI sender to receive from.

objarg.name: num_channels
objarg.description: Sets the number of audio channels to receive.

method.name: ptz_store_preset
method.digest: Stores a PTZ preset on the NDI source.
method.description: Stores a PTZ preset on the NDI source. Must be in range 0 to 99. Will only be sent if the NDI source has reported as being PTZ capable.

method.name: ptz_recall_preset
method.digest: Stores a PTZ preset on the NDI source.
method.description: Recalls a PTZ preset on the NDI source. Must be in range 0 to 99. Recall speed must be in range 0 to 1, where 1 is the fastest move possible. Will only be sent if the NDI source has reported as being PTZ capable.

attribute.name: hostname
attribute.digest: Host name of NDI sender to receive from
attribute.description: Host name of the NDI sender to receive from. This can be set even if the host does not currently exist or if it is not currently sending.

attribute.name: name
attribute.digest: Name of NDI sender to receive from
attribute.description: Name of the NDI sender to receive from. This can be set even if the host does not currently exist or if it is not currently sending.

attribute.name: colormode
attribute.description: Output matrices color encoding. If set to ARGB then object will internally convert from UVYV as all NDI video is sent using this format.

attribute.name: low_bandwidth
attribute.description: Low bandwidth mode. When enabled NDI will attempt to reduce the bandwidth used at the expense of image quality.

attribute.name: tally_onpreview
attribute.description: The tally status indicating whether this receiver is displaying the source on preview. Will be communicated back over the network to the sender.

attribute.name: tally_onprogram
attribute.description: The tally status indicating whether this receiver is displaying the source on program. Will be communicated back over the network to the sender.

attribute.name: ptz_capable
attribute.digest: Readonly attribute to indicate if the connected NDI source is PTZ capable.
attribute.description: Readonly attribute to indicate if the connected NDI source is PTZ capable. All PTZ attributes will be disabled until this is set to 1.

attribute.name: ptz_zoom
attribute.description: Absolute PTZ zoom value. Sets the PTZ zoom value of the NDI source to this exact value.

attribute.name: ptz_zoom_speed
attribute.description: PTZ zoom adjustment speed. Instructs to source to continuously adjust it's PTZ zoom value at this speed. Best used with a joystick or other controller input which automatically re-centers to 0 when released.

attribute.name: ptz_pantilt
attribute.description: Absolute PTZ pan/tilt position. Sets the PTZ pan/tilt position of the NDI source to this exact value.

attribute.name: ptz_pantilt_speed
attribute.description: PTZ pan/tilt adjustment speed. Instructs to source to continuously adjust it's PTZ pan/tilt position at this speed. Best used with a joystick or other controller input which automatically re-centers to 0 when released.

attribute.name: ptz_focus
attribute.description: Absolute PTZ focus value. Sets the PTZ focus value of the NDI source to this exact value. Only applied when 'ptz_autofocus' is set to 0.

attribute.name: ptz_focus_speed
attribute.description: PTZ focus adjustment speed. Instructs to source to continuously adjust it's PTZ focus value at this speed. Best used with a joystick or other controller input which automatically re-centers to 0 when released.

attribute.name: ptz_whitebalance_mode
attribute.description: PTZ white balance mode. 0 = Auto, 1 = Indoor, 2 = Outdoor, 3 = One-push, 4 = Manual. When in manual mode use 'ptz_whitebalance_red' and 'ptz_whitebalance_blue' to adjust white balance setting.

attribute.name: ptz_whitebalance_red
attribute.digest: PTZ manual white balance red value.
attribute.description: PTZ manual white balance red value. Only applied when 'ptz_whitebalance_mode' is set to 4 (manual).

attribute.name: ptz_whitebalance_blue
attribute.digest: PTZ manual white balance blue value.
attribute.description: PTZ manual white balance blue value. Only applied when 'ptz_whitebalance_mode' is set to 4 (manual).

attribute.name: ptz_exposure
attribute.description: Absolute PTZ exposure value. Sets the PTZ focus value of the NDI source to this exact value. Only applied when 'ptz_autoexposure' is set to 0.
